author: @4ian
name: Health
shortDescription: Manage health (life) points, shield and armor.
description: Manage health (life) points, shield and armor.
- Inanimate objects (for insance breakable doors or mining rocks)
The top-down RPG example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://top-down-rpg)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Manage health (life) points, shield and armor.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Health

events.comment: Health
Correct any values above maximum limits
Shield
Correct any values above maximum limits

events.name: Remove shield points if shield expired

eventsFunctions.description: Apply damage to the object. Shield and armor can reduce this damage if enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: Hit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Apply _PARAM2_ points of damage to _PARAM0_ (Damage can be reduced by Shield: _PARAM3_, Armor: _PARAM4_)

events.comment: Only consider incoming damage when damage cooldown is not active
No damage will be applied when dodged
If shield is active, damage the shield first
If damage is less than shield, subtract damage from shield.
If damage is greater than shield, conditionally apply excess damage based on property
Apply excess damage only if shield does not block excess damage

eventsFunctions.description: current health points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Health
eventsFunctions.sentence: health points

eventsFunctions.description: Change the health points of the object. Will not trigger damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the health of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

events.comment: If MaxHealth is set, prevent health from going above it

eventsFunctions.description: Change the health points of the object. Will not trigger damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCurrentHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the health of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Heal the object by increasing its health points.
eventsFunctions.name: Heal
eventsFunctions.sentence: Heal _PARAM0_ with _PARAM2_ health points

events.comment: If Max Health is not set, do not enforce Max Health
If Max Health is set and Overhealing is not allowed
Perform heal
Update healing trigger

parameters.description: Points to heal (will be added to object health)
parameters.name: HealValue

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum health points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: the maximum health points

events.comment: Make sure Current Health does not exceed new Max Health

eventsFunctions.description: Change the object maximum health points.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxHealth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the maximum health of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: the rate of health regeneration (points per second).
eventsFunctions.name: HealthRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: the rate of health regeneration

eventsFunctions.description: Change the rate of health regeneration.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealthRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the rate of health regen of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points per second

eventsFunctions.description: the duration of damage cooldown (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: DamageCooldownDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: the duration of damage cooldown

eventsFunctions.description: Change the duration of damage cooldown (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: SetCooldownDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the duration of damage cooldown on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the delay before health regeneration starts after last being hit (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: HealthRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: the health regeneration delay

eventsFunctions.description: Change the delay before health regeneration starts after being hit.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealthRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the health regeneration delay on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the chance to dodge incoming damage (range: 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: ChanceToDodge
eventsFunctions.sentence: the chance to dodge incoming damage

eventsFunctions.description: Change the chance to dodge incoming damage.
eventsFunctions.name: SetChanceToDodge
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the chance to dodge on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: the flat damage reduction from the armor. Incoming damage is reduced by this value.
eventsFunctions.name: FlatDamageReduction
eventsFunctions.sentence: the armor flat damage reduction

eventsFunctions.description: Change the flat damage reduction from armor. Incoming damage is reduced by this value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFlatDamageReduction
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the flat damage reduction from armor on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: the percent damage reduction from armor (range: 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: PercentDamageReduction
eventsFunctions.sentence: the armor percent damage reduction

eventsFunctions.description: Change the percent damage reduction from armor. Range: 0 to 1.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPercentDamageReduction
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the percent damage reduction from armor on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Allow heals to increase health above max health.  Regeneration will not exceed max health.
eventsFunctions.name: AllowOverHealing
eventsFunctions.sentence: Allow over-healing on _PARAM0_: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Mark object as hit at least once.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Mark object as hit at least once
eventsFunctions.name: SetHitAtLeastOnce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Mark _PARAM0_ as hit at least once: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Mark object as just damaged.
eventsFunctions.name: SetJustDamaged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Mark _PARAM0_ as just damaged: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Trigger damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: TriggerDamageCooldown
eventsFunctions.sentence: Trigger the damage cooldown on _PARAM0_

events.comment: Mark that the object was hit at least once (used for initial state of damage cooldown)

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object has been hit at least once.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Object has been hit at least once
eventsFunctions.name: HitAtLeastOnce
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ has been hit at least once

events.comment: This condition is used to prevent "damage cooldown" from being active when the game starts.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if health was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustDamaged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Health has just been damaged on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object was just healed previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustHealed
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ has just been healed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if damage cooldown is active. Object and shield cannot be damaged while this is active.
eventsFunctions.name: IsDamageCooldownActive
eventsFunctions.sentence: Damage cooldown on _PARAM0_ is active

eventsFunctions.description: the time before damage cooldown ends (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: DamageCooldownRemaining
eventsFunctions.sentence: the time before damage cooldown end

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is considered dead (no health points).
eventsFunctions.name: IsDead
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ is dead

eventsFunctions.description: the time since last taken hit (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: TimeSinceLastHit
eventsFunctions.sentence: the time since last taken hit on health

eventsFunctions.description: the health damage taken from most recent hit.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Health damage taken from most recent hit
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousDamageTaken
eventsFunctions.sentence: the health damage taken from most recent hit

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum shield points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: the maximum shield points

eventsFunctions.description: Change the maximum shield points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the maximum shield of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: Change maximum shield points.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxShieldPoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the maximum shield points on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: the current shield points of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldPoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: the shield points

eventsFunctions.description: Change current shield points. Will not trigger damage cooldown.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldPoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change current shield points on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points

eventsFunctions.description: the rate of shield regeneration (points per second).
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: the rate of shield regeneration

eventsFunctions.description: Change rate of shield regeneration.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldRegenRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shield regeneration rate of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ points per second

eventsFunctions.description: the delay before shield regeneration starts after being hit (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: the shield regeneration delay

eventsFunctions.description: Change delay before shield regeneration starts after being hit.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldRegenDelay
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the shield regeneration delay on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the duration of the shield (seconds). A value of "0" means the shield is permanent.
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: the duration of the shield

eventsFunctions.description: Change duration of shield. Use "0" to make shield permanent.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the duration of shield on _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Renew shield duration to it's full value.
eventsFunctions.name: RenewShieldDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Renew the shield duration on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Activate the shield by setting the shield points and renewing the shield duration (optional).
eventsFunctions.name: ActivateShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: Activate the shield on _PARAM0_ with _PARAM2_ points (Renew shield duration: _PARAM3_)

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) blocking excess damage when shield breaks.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Block excess damage when shield breaks
eventsFunctions.name: SetShieldBlockExcessDamage
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ blocks excess damage when it breaks: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the shield was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsShieldJustDamaged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ has just been damaged

eventsFunctions.description: Check if incoming damage was just dodged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustDodged
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ just dodged incoming damage

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the shield is active (based on shield points and duration).
eventsFunctions.name: IsShieldActive
eventsFunctions.sentence: Shield on _PARAM0_ is active

events.comment: To be considered "active", a shield must have positive points AND not exceed duration
Don't check the timer when duration is zero (or negative)

eventsFunctions.description: the time before the shield duration ends (seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: ShieldTimeRemaining
eventsFunctions.sentence: the time before the shield duration end

eventsFunctions.description: the shield damage taken from most recent hit.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Shield damage taken from most recent hit
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousDamageToShield
eventsFunctions.sentence: the shield damage taken from most recent hit

eventsFunctions.description: the health points gained from previous heal.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Health points gained from previous heal
eventsFunctions.name: PreviousHealAmount
eventsFunctions.sentence: the health points gained from previous heal

propertyDescriptors.label: Allow heals to increase health above max health (regen will never exceed max health)
propertyDescriptors.name: AllowOverHealing

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage to health from the previous incoming damage
propertyDescriptors.name: DamageToBeApplied

propertyDescriptors.label: Chance to dodge incoming damage (between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.description: When a damage is dodged, no damage is applied.
propertyDescriptors.name: ChanceToDodge

propertyDescriptors.label: Health points gained from the previous heal
propertyDescriptors.name: HealToBeApplied

propertyDescriptors.label: Rate of health regeneration (points per second)
propertyDescriptors.name: HealthRegenRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Health regeneration delay
propertyDescriptors.description: Delay before health regeneration starts after a hit.
propertyDescriptors.name: HealthRegenDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Duration of shield
propertyDescriptors.description: Use 0 to make the shield permanent.
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Rate of shield regeneration (points per second)
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldRegenRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Block excess damage when shield is broken
propertyDescriptors.name: BlockExcessDamage

propertyDescriptors.label: Shield regeneration delay
propertyDescriptors.description: Delay before shield regeneration starts after a hit.
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldRegenDelay

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage to shield from the previous incoming damage
propertyDescriptors.name: ShieldDamageTaken

propertyDescriptors.label: Flat damage reduction from armor
propertyDescriptors.description: Incoming damages are reduced by this value.
propertyDescriptors.name: FlatDamageReduction

propertyDescriptors.label: Percentage damage reduction from armor (between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.name: PercentDamageReduction
